meanings.definition: A book in digital form that can be read on a computer or electronic device.
meanings.sent1: I enjoy reading ebooks on my tablet.
meanings.sent2: She downloaded several ebooks for her long flight.
meanings.sent3: The ebooks on my phone kept me entertained during the commute.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was an open library, filled with colorful ebooks.
meanings.sent5: The world of ebooks is vast and fascinating.

meanings.definition: To publish or make available a book in digital form.
meanings.sent1: Authors often choose to ebooks their novels for wider reach.
meanings.sent2: They decided to ebooks their research findings for free access.
meanings.sent3: The company plans to ebooks their entire catalog next year.
meanings.sent4: She wanted to ebooks her poetry collection to share with friends.
meanings.sent5: The decision to ebooks the classic novel was met with excitement.
